app.title: 100-Day Recovery AI Generator
app.subtitle: Recovery Journey Visualization
app.disclaimer: This software is for lawful use only, intended to help users understand the general recovery process. Do not use for illegal purposes.

home.title: Cases
home.noCases: No cases yet. Click the button above to create one.
home.hint: All your cases are listed here. Click a case card to enter the workbench, or click "Present" to view the recovery timeline in fullscreen.

case.name: Case Name
case.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this case? All related images will be removed.
case.createHint: Fill in the basic case info. Surgery type and patient details help AI generate more accurate results.

workbench.noSource: No source image for this day
workbench.promptPlaceholder: AI-generated prompt will appear here. You can edit it manually...
workbench.folderHint: Select a folder with images organized by day (supports subfolders or filenames with day numbers/dates)
workbench.folderNoImages: No images detected. Please check the folder structure.
workbench.timelineHint: The timeline shows all days. Blue dots indicate source images, green dots indicate generated images. Click to select a day.
workbench.sourceHint: Source area: Upload the actual photo for this day. Click "Analyze Image" to let AI recognize the content and auto-generate a prompt.
workbench.promptHint: Prompt area: AI fills this after analyzing. You can manually edit it to adjust the generation result.
workbench.resultHint: Result area: Click "Generate" to create an AI recovery image from the prompt. Click "Re-roll" to try again.
workbench.uploadHint: Upload source images for a specific day. Day 0 is surgery day, negative numbers are pre-op, positive are post-op days.
workbench.batchImportHint: Import an entire folder of source images at once. Supports subfolders by day (e.g. day0/, day3/) or filenames with day numbers/dates.

textToImage.title: Text to Image
textToImage.hint: Generate recovery images from text alone â€” no source photo needed. Select parameters, click "Generate Prompt", then "Generate Image".

viewer.title: Presentation Mode
viewer.selectCase: Select a case to start presentation
viewer.hint: Fullscreen recovery presentation. Use arrow keys or side buttons to navigate, press Esc to exit.

caseLibrary.hint: The Case Library is read-only. You can search and browse cases here, but cannot add or delete. To create a new case, go to the Home page.

activation.label: Enter Activation Code
activation.error: Activation failed, please check your code
activation.contact: To get an activation code, add WeChat:
